titleStmt.title: The proceedings of the army under the command of Sir Thomas Fairfax From ... Containing the story of the Club-men, and relief of Taunton. Wherein is expressed the propositions of the Club-men, and Sir Thomas Fairfax his answer unto them. Sent from Mr Bowles (Chaplain to Sir Thomas Fairfax) to a friend of his in London.
titleStmt.author: Bowles, Edward, 1613-1662.
Gellibrand, Samuel, d. 1675, publisher.

biblFull.extent: 7 v. [Numb. 1] (first of July to the sixth)-Numb. 7. (eighth of August to the fifteenth of the same.).

notesStmt.note: Written and edited by Edward Bowles.
On titlepage above imprint: "Published according to order."
Titles of first four issues fluctuate.
Reproduction of original in the John Rylands University Library.
